alert.note: Alert for Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Millard County through 400 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 38 miles southwest of Delta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Millard County. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 40 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
